title: FS: 1910 P2 Sweet Caporal Pins Frank Chance & Johnny Evers Both PSA

posts.post_title: FS: 1910 P2 Sweet Caporal Pins Frank Chance & Johnny Evers Both PSA
posts.post_content:
I won these recently from a PWCC Auction, but I also bought a lot of these pins which contained these two, so, I need to sell these. SOLD shipped for the Evers and SOLD shipped for the Chance-thanks for looking!!
Joe
